title: FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator
summary: This page introduces the FlexPay Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator, designed to help subscription businesses understand and quantify the true cost of failed payments. It highlights how failed payments lead to customer churn and lost future revenue, and offers a tool to calculate potential revenue and customer growth with FlexPay's Invisible Recovery solution.
key_points: Calculate the estimated additional 12-month revenue and active customer growth with FlexPay Invisible Recovery.
Understand the true cost of failed payments beyond the single declined transaction.
Learn how to calculate the total value from successful customer recovery.
Access an online tool to calculate these values for your specific business.
